name: Ouba - The Cubic Escape
description:
An escape room game where the puzzles get harder as you progress in the game.

This is one of my very first projects in unity engine.

========================================================

Solutions:
  • Level 2: 

Get closer to the images so numbers appear on them, the numbers indicate how many cubes should go into each of the three plates.

Red plate: 3 red cubes

Orange plate: 1 orange cube

Yellow plate: 2 yellow cubes

  • Level 3:

Just like level 2's puzzle except with a twist. So the correct answer would be

Red plate: 2 yellow cubes

Orange plate: 1 orange cube

Yellow plate: 3 red cubes
